message:
SYSTEM: LPS_BIGGER-09.03.2017.pdf: Página 31
Future paths
Ideas:
• Semantic paths
• Use the semantic graph around brands/companies together 
with Named Entity Recognition
• Use lexic-syntactic patterns
• Topic modeling (Library)
• Machine learning paths
• Hierarchy (first satisfaction/dissatisfaction, then other
emotions)
• Interaction emotions (not independent paths).
• Better lexicons.
• For English, more resources (Senticnet…)
• Other options?
31
speaker: SYSTEM
